attributes.action: Pass a Law stating that the Minister for Defence must have served at least four years in one of HM Armed Forces, and have had no serious disciplinary actions taken against them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state of the current government is a shambles, especially the fact that the Secretary of State for Defence has no experience of what it is like to actually be a serviceperson. This needs to stop, if someone is going to be in charge of something they need to know their arse from their elbow in relation to it and not be some self-serving little weasel who's just in it for the money.
